title: [Epidemiology] People who have recovered from COVID-19, including those no longer reporting symptoms, exhibit significant cognitive deficits versus controls according to a survey of 80,000+ participants conducted in conjunction with the scientific documentary series, BBC2 Horizon
[Medicine] Using Povidone-Iodine in Sinonasal and Oral Cavities - "The antiseptic can quickly inactivate coronaviruses, including SARS, MERS and, yes, SARS-CoV-2."
